name: Immortum Deungeon
tagline: Unity Project by Logan Pletcher for the AIE Programming Year 1 ADGP 130 Assignment.
body:
This is a First Person 3D Hack and Slash game made in Unity and built for webGL.
All you need to do is download the .zip file and open the html file in the Assets folder.
Warning, webGL does not work in chrome so you must open the file in another web browser. I recommend using Firefox.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
